question: How many amino acids does davunetide consist of?
ideal_answer: Davunetide or NAP is an eight amino acid peptide.

snippets.text: We have assessed the effects of NAP (davunetide), an eight-amino acid peptide that decreases tau hyperphosphorylation, in mice overexpressing wild-type human α-synuclein (Thy1-aSyn mice), a model that recapitulates aspects of PD.
